message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a one-of-a-kind item that I think you'll really love. I'm willing to let it go for $200.
Thanks for the offer, Alice! I'm really interested in this product, but $200 is a bit higher than my budget. I'm willing to pay $150 for it. What do you think?
Thanks for your offer, Bob! I understand that $200 might be a bit steep for you. I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm thinking of selling it to you for $175. What do you think?
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $175 is still a bit more than I'm comfortable spending. I'm happy to pay $160 for the product.  Let me know what you think.
I understand that you're trying to get the best deal, Bob! I'm willing to make one more concession. I'll sell it to you for $170. That's the lowest I can go. What do you think?
